TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DefaultSecureMimeContext extends MimeKit.Cryptography.SecureMimeContext

Docs.summary: A default implementation that uses an SQLite database as a certificate and private key store.
Docs.remarks: The default S/MIME context is designed to be usable on any platform where there exists a .NET runtime by storing certificates, CRLs, and (encrypted) private keys in a SQLite database.

MemberSignature.Value: public DefaultSecureMimeContext ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Docs.remarks: Not recommended for production use as the password to unlock the private keys is hard-coded.
Docs.exception: An error occurred reading the database at the default location.
The user does not have access to read the database at the default location.

MemberSignature.Value: public DefaultSecureMimeContext (string password);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string password) cil managed

Docs.param: The password used for encrypting and decrypting the private keys.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Docs.remarks: Allows the program to specify its own password for the default database.
Docs.exception: The user does not have access to read the database at the default location.
An error occurred reading the database at the default location.

MemberSignature.Value: public DefaultSecureMimeContext (string fileName, string password);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string fileName, string password) cil managed

Docs.param: The path to the SQLite database.
The password used for encrypting and decrypting the private keys.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Docs.remarks: Allows the program to specify its own location for the SQLite database. If the file does not exist, it will be created and the necessary tables and indexes will be constructed.
Docs.exception: An error occurred reading the file.
The specified file path is empty.
The user does not have access to read the specified file.

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly string DefaultDatabasePath;
.field public static initonly string DefaultDatabasePath

Docs.summary: The default database path for certificates, private keys and CRLs.

remarks.para: On Microsoft Windows-based systems, this path will be something like C:\Users\UserName\AppData\Roaming\mimekit\smime.db.
On Unix systems such as Linux and Mac OS X, this path will be ~/.mimekit/smime.db.

Docs.remarks: A Certificate Revocation List (CRL) is a list of certificate serial numbers issued by a particular Certificate Authority (CA) that have been revoked, either by the CA itself or by the owner of the revoked certificate.
